SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.
Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:AddColour( COLOUR_GREEN ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if EffectDC() ~= nil then local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:PutInHand() end end
